text:
The very last paragraph in the war task document begins:
“We regulary receive bug reports that this task is creating the WEB-INF directory,”
Besides misspelling “regularly”, this sentence is missing the word “not” before the word "creating". I think it should read: 
“We regularly receive bug reports that this task is not creating the WEB-INF directory,”
creator: MHahn@TCBTech.com
